recentPerformance.hitRate: Hit rushing over in 8 of 9 games (88.9%)

keyFactors.title: Elite Consistency (88.9% Over Rate)
keyFactors.description: 695 yards (77.2 YPG, 5th in NFL). Hit rushing over in 8 of 9 games. 70+ yard games in 6 of 9 games (66.7%). Required only 4.2 YPC on 17 touches to hit over.

keyFactors.title: Workhorse Role - 85%+ Touch Share
keyFactors.description: 135 carries (15.0 per game). Backup RJ Harvey minimal role (3 carries, 9 yards in game). Dobbins handled 85%+ of RB touches season-long. Sean Payton's trust: 'He's a warrior.'

keyFactors.title: Raiders' 6th-Worst EPA Run Defense
keyFactors.description: Raiders run defense ranked 16th in NFL (109.4 YPG allowed) but 6th-worst in EPA against run (exploitable). No 100-yard rushers allowed in 2025 before this game but vulnerable to physical backs.

keyFactors.title: Favorable Game Script
keyFactors.description: Broncos -9.5 favorites (clock control expected). Expected 16-20 carries. Week 4: 101 yards vs. Cincinnati (first Broncos 100-yard rusher in 38 games). Denver expected to lean on ground game with lead.

keyFactors.title: Plus-Money Value (+100)
keyFactors.description: Plus-money odds (+100) on a bet with 75-78% true win probability = exceptional value. Historical data strongly supported over with massive implied probability edge.

riskFactors: 4-game touchdown drought (concern for scoring props, not yardage)
Receiving role limited (only 1 target in 5 of last 6 games)
Brief injury history - need to monitor in-game

quarterBreakdown.description: Dobbins carried 5 times for 23 yards. Broncos established ground game early. Physical running style wore down Raiders' defense.
6 carries for 28 yards. Steady volume as Broncos controlled clock. 51 yards at half (on pace for 102-yard game).
quarterBreakdown.halftimeTotal: 51 yards at half (on pace to OVER)

quarterBreakdown.description: Hit OVER with 4:17 remaining in 3rd quarter. Brief injury scare but returned immediately. 4 carries for 18 yards in quarter.
3 carries for 8 yards. Broncos kneeled inside Raiders 20-yard line rather than scoring (conservative approach). Sean Payton post-game: 'Wouldn't have that W without him.'

gameResults.whenCleared: Hit OVER (70.5 yards) with 4:17 remaining in 3rd quarter on 17th carry. Cleared line by 6.5 yards with room to spare.
gameResults.gamePace: Low-scoring defensive game (17 total points). Bo Nix threw 2 INTs, 11 penalties for 78 yards meant offense relied heavily on Dobbins to sustain drives.
gameResults.foulTrouble: Brief injury scare in Q3 but Dobbins returned immediately and finished strong with 18 total carries.

whatWentRight.title: Workhorse Role Delivered (PRIMARY FACTOR)
whatWentRight.description: 18 carries vs. Harvey's 3 (85.7% snap share). Volume guarantee exceeded projection (16-17 expected). Got the touches needed to hit over comfortably.

whatWentRight.title: Raiders' EPA-Weighted Defensive Weakness
whatWentRight.description: Raiders' 6th-worst EPA run defense struggled with Dobbins' physicality. 4.3 YPC below season average (5.1) but sufficient volume compensated.

whatWentRight.title: Game Script Execution Perfect
whatWentRight.description: Broncos led throughout after Q1, leaned on ground game. Passing game struggles (Bo Nix 2 INTs, 11 penalties for 78 yards) meant offense relied on Dobbins.

whatWentRight.title: Clock Management Favored Run Game
whatWentRight.description: Broncos kneeled inside Raiders 20-yard line rather than scoring (conservative approach). Game plan prioritized ball control over explosive plays.

postGameAnalysis.wasNormalVariance: Expected outcome based on elite consistency. The 70.5 line significantly undervalued Dobbins' 88.9% over rate and failed to account for Raiders' EPA-weighted defensive weakness. Required only 4.2 YPC with expected volume - well within capability against exploitable run defense. Plus-money odds (+100) on a bet with 75-78% true win probability represented exceptional value.

closingLineValue.verdict: Positive CLV (+8 cents). Line moved toward Over as market recognized Dobbins' elite consistency and favorable matchup. Capturing plus-money value crucial for maximizing expected value.

keyTakeaways: 88.9% over rate over 9 games = legitimate edge, not variance
Volume is king - 18 carries guaranteed hitting over with modest efficiency
EPA-weighted defensive rankings more predictive than traditional yards allowed
Plus-money odds (+100) on high-probability outcomes (75-78%) = exceptional value
Game script execution (Broncos leading, clock control) played out exactly as projected
Maintained 88.9% over rate (now 9 of 10 games) - consistency edge remains exploitable
verdict: Textbook value bet. Process and results aligned perfectly. The 70.5 line dramatically undervalued Dobbins' elite consistency and EPA-weighted matchup advantage. Plus-money odds created 25+ percentage point edge over market.
